scripts.db:reset:dev: NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:drop && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:create && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:reset:prod: NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:init:prod: NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:seed:all
